Alternatively, taking a side like MIDDLE_LEFT could set up a horizontal line.

So, the best bet is to take a diagonal, like BOTTOM_RIGHT. Then, if O blocks, I can create another line. Alternatively, taking a side to set up a horizontal or vertical.
